name: Tiny Talos
description:
Clean the house as Tiny Talos!

Explore everyone's favorite High Quality house from a brand new 10cm tall perspective. Clean up messes, destroy or capture little robots, and collect all 8 rainbow hearts to win. Use sparkle points to access new parts of the house and unlock new weapons, chips, and abilities.

Keep yourself charged before each time of day shifts in order to begin the next segment with a full battery, or else you'll collapse and have to wait to recharge. Explore every nook and cranny the house has to make the most of what you can find.

Controls

The controls are available from the in-game tab labeled "controls" at any time. Hit Tab to view them.

Known Issues
  • Some things respawn incorrectly within the 3 in-game day respawn period, but this doesn't impede game progress.
